draft.label: Draft
draft.description: Your resource will not be accessible by other users.

published.label: Published
published.description: Your resource will be accessible by other users.

public.label: Public
public.description: Your resource will be accessible by everyone.

private.label: Private
private.description: Your resource will be accessible only by you.

protected.label: Protected
protected.description: Your resource will be accessible by everyone who have the password.

global.search: Search a quizz by name or author
global.description: Find below all the quizzes. You can search for a quizz by its name or by the name of the person who published it.

results.title: Results - {{quizzName}}
results.description: Here are the results of your quizz. It is possible to search for a result by user by using the search bar below.

history.description: Below you will find the history of your attempts for a quizz. If you're the quizz creator, you will also have access to the attempts of other users.

delete.title: Are you sure ?
delete.description: Your quizz will be deleted and attempts did by users also.

jumbotron.description: Below the list of your quizzes. On this page you can create a brand new quizz from scratch, or import it from a file. You can access to your quizz history to see your latest attempts.

card.questions: This quizz is composed  of {{questions}} question(s).

remainingAttempts.no-more: You have used up all your attempts for this quizz.
remainingAttempts.basic: You have {{remainingAttempts}} remaining attempts for this quizz.

import.title: Import a Quizz
import.subtitle: Here you can import a Quizz from a file. See the example below for the file format. When you've selected your file, you'll have to validate that your file is correct (to avoid errors), and click on import. You'll be redirected on the Quizz form creation, with all fields pre-filled.

file.label: File
file.noFile: You haven't uploaded your file yet.

example.label: Example
example.description: Below an example of the accepted format for your Quizz file. There are some rules to respect :

rules.delimiter: Each question should be delimited by "---"
rules.alternatives: Each question can have up to 4 alternatives (A, B, C, D), but only 2 are required (A, B).
rules.answers: Your question can have multiple answers. Simply delimit them with a comma. (Answer: A,D)

subtitle.create: Fill the form below to create a new Quizz.
subtitle.update: Change values in the form below to update your quizz.

hints.name: The Quizz name will be displayed in the application.
hints.allowedRetries: The number of attempts allowed per user. If the number of attempts is greater than 1, the user's score on the quizz will be the average of all those attempts.

questions.noCorrectAlternatives: One or more questions are not valid. Please review your questions and re-submit the form. Each question should have at least 2 alternatives, with one correct.

name.empty: The name of the Quizz cannot be empty.

allowedRetries.min: The number of allowed retries must be greater than or equal to 1.

questions.description: Below you can add questions to your quizz. To be valid, each question must have at least 2 alternatives, one of which must be correct. Each quizz must be composed of at least 1 question.

mean.label: Mean
mean.description: The score will be computed as the mean of the attempts score for a user.

max.label: Maximum
max.description: The score retained will be the maximum obtained on the various attempts for a user.
